name: Grinding Late Night
description:
A sneaky game about grinding games at late night. 
Don't tell your mom!

----Controls----
WASD - Movement
Space - Interact

----Hints----
If you're hungry, don't forget to.. eat.. obviously.
Press your phone to call a pizzeria! They hopefully bring a pizza in 5 seconds. It would be cool if the same would happen irl, right?

When Mommy knocks on the door, don't forget to act like you're sleeping in bed!
(She obviously doesn't notices that the PC is on!)
